posts.post_content:
@DarkShinobi93   
  
Not really from a mill standpoint; you just want them to try and draw without any cards in the library, you don't really care where the cards ended up. In fact having cards in hand is fine and dandy because you can bet good money they won't be cheating much of anything into play seeing as the vast majority of that happens with the graveyard... which Tamiyo stops. So keep some counters on hand.

Posted By: Continue (12/2/2012 4:28:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Dedicated mill decks will always be casual in my opinion. But he is good for the +1 and the ultimate, and the 0 ability can come in handy.  
  
Using him as a "0 hero" might be okay. But mill is not really doing anything until you win. It could disrupt tutors or top deck manipulation, or even disrupt a heavy card draw deck. But other then those situations, its not really impacting the game.  
  
Still I will use him as a "0 hero" If I got an okay board position and a handful of cards. Otherwise take the card advantage. Still a nice alternative win condition.  
  
As for his ultimate, if you cant win the game after drawing 20 cards, your not playing magic correctly. Even if you have to discard down to 7, you still should win the game. But theirs no need to discard with the reprint of the tower. Also, if my opponent is close to 30 cards left, I have won the game plenty of times by letting them draw 20 and then dropping another Jace.
posts.html:
Dedicated mill decks will always be casual in my opinion. But he is good for the +1 and the ultimate, and the 0 ability can come in handy.

Using him as a "0 hero" might be okay. But mill is not really doing anything until you win. It could disrupt tutors or top deck manipulation, or even disrupt a heavy card draw deck. But other then those situations, its not really impacting the game.

Still I will use him as a "0 hero" If I got an okay board position and a handful of cards. Otherwise take the card advantage. Still a nice alternative win condition.

As for his ultimate, if you cant win the game after drawing 20 cards, your not playing magic correctly. Even if you have to discard down to 7, you still should win the game. But theirs no need to discard with the reprint of the tower. Also, if my opponent is close to 30 cards left, I have won the game plenty of times by letting them draw 20 and then dropping another Jace.
